word_mean: 吸引术：应用抽吸器从腔中吸除液体或气体

sentence.Network_en: He nurses an aspiration to be a poet.
Taiwan will return to the embrace of the motherland; the whole country must be united. This is the general trend of development and the common aspiration of the people.
sentence.Network_cn: 台湾要回到祖国的怀抱, 全国一定要统一.这是大势所趋,人心所向.

sentence.Network_en: Man's aspiration should be as lofty as the stars.
sentence.Network_cn: 人的志气应当象天上的星星那么高.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English  (in sense 2): from Latin aspiratio(n-), from the verb aspirare (see aspire)

entry.def: Some-one's aspirations are their desire to achieve things.

example.ex: ...the needs and aspirations of our pupils...
example.tran: 我们的学生的需要和志向

example.ex: He is unlikely to send in the army to quell nationalist aspirations.
example.tran: 他不可能派兵去扼杀民族主义理想。

sentences.sentence: "his ambition is to own his own business"

means.word_mean: 3. a manner of articulation involving an audible release of breath
4. the act of inhaling; the drawing in of air (or other gases) as in breathing

stems_affixes.value_cn: 热心的,积极的,有抱负的
stems_affixes.word_buile: aspire[v.[to,after]渴望,追求,有志于]+ing表形容词→adj.热心的,积极的,有抱负的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 精神饱满的;生机勃勃的
stems_affixes.word_buile: spirit精神+ed……的→adj.精神饱满的;生机勃勃的
spirit精神+ual……的→adj.精神[上]的,心灵的
conspire[v.阴谋,同谋,谋叛]+acy表名词→n.阴谋,密谋,共谋
expire[v.期满,[期限]终止;呼气;断气,死亡]+ation表名词→n.期满,终止
inspire[v.鼓舞,激起;使产生灵感]+ation表名词→n.灵感;鼓舞,激励
spir呼吸,精神+it名词→n.精神;志气;[n.]情绪,心情;[n.]酒精
a加强+spir呼吸,精神+e→看到希望的东西加强呼吸→渴望,追求
dis去掉+pirit=spirit精神→去掉精神→使沮丧

stems_affixes.value_cn: 期满,[期限]终止;呼气;断气,死亡
stems_affixes.word_buile: ex出+pire=spir呼吸→有出气没进气→断气
in进入+spir呼吸,精神+e→吸气进去→引申为鼓励
per全部+spir呼吸+e→全身呼吸→出汗
trans改变,交流+spir呼吸,精神+e→互相呼吸→transpire泄漏

Sentence.sentence: and the choice of commencement speakers often reflects a balance of institutional priorities and aspirations
The company likes to present itself as having lofty aspirations.

means.word_mean: 强烈的愿望, 志向, 抱负

sentences.en: She has aspirations to become a great writer.
sentences.cn: 她有成为一个大作家的志向。

jushi.english: Her father opposed her collegiate aspiration.
jushi.chinese: 她父亲反对她上大学的愿望。

jushi.english: The democratic ideal was the common aspiration of men.
jushi.chinese: 民主的理想是人们追求的目标。

jushi.english: The new treaty embodies the aspirations of most nonaligned countries.
jushi.chinese: 新条约体现了大多数不结盟国家的愿望。
